articles.content: After the Total War Warhammer 3 community joined forces to voice concern over the increased pricing of the fantasy strategy game’s DLC with Shadows of Change, developer Creative Assembly has issued a… [+3497 chars]

articles.title: Video shows Tesla Model S go head-to-head with Chevrolet Corvette in drag race — see who gets left in the dust - Yahoo
